name: dapr-client
description: The official Dapr (https://dapr.io) SDK for Node.js

scripts.test: npm run test:unit:all && npm run test:e2e:all
scripts.test:load:http: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol http --app-port 50001 --dapr-http-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components npm run test:load 'test/load'
scripts.test:e2e:all: npm run test:e2e:grpc:main && npm run test:e2e:http:main && npm run test:e2e:http:actors
scripts.test:e2e:grpc:main: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol grpc --app-port 50001 --dapr-grpc-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components npm run test:e2e 'test/e2e/main.grpc.test.ts'
scripts.test:e2e:http:main: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol http --app-port 50001 --dapr-http-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components npm run test:e2e 'test/e2e/main.http.test.ts'
scripts.test:e2e:http:actors: dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol http --app-port 50001 --dapr-http-port 50000 --components-path ./test/components npm run test:e2e 'test/e2e/actors.http.test.ts'
scripts.test:unit:all: npm run test:unit:main && npm run test:unit:actors
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && nodemon --ext ".ts,.js" --watch "./src" --exec "npm run build"

author: Xavier Geerinck
